Connections¶

Tools for interacting with databases

harrison_functions.utils.connections.postgres_connect_fetch_close(query, connection_uri, db_name=None, read_only=True)¶

Opens a new connection, fetches the data, then closes the connection Provide the connection_uri returned by postgres_connection Use dbname to change the database


harrison_functions.utils.connections.query_sql_or_csv(db_query, df_query=None, csv_filepath=None, default_columns=None, connection_uri=None)¶

Swtich case to get data from database or csv
